Container.Requires: Docker socket access for container management

Config.Name: Web UI Port
Config.Description: Port for DDC web interface (host port, mapped to container port 9374).

Config.Name: Admin Password
Config.Description: Password for web UI admin user (username: admin). REQUIRED: Set a secure password during installation.

Config.Name: Flask Secret Key
Config.Description: Secret key for web UI security. RECOMMENDED: Generate with 'openssl rand -hex 32' for persistent sessions. If not set, a random key is generated (sessions reset on restart).

Config.Name: Discord Bot Token
Config.Description: Optional: Discord bot token (recommended for security). Can also be configured via Web UI.

Config.Name: Config Directory
Config.Description: DDC configuration files (bot tokens, channel settings, etc.)
